originalText.text: Excellent doctor. I see many negative comments about the front office lady. I think she is overworked and not necessarily rude. Also in some cultures, women are a bit more reserved in a cultural sense.  Guess being patient with her will help and I didn't have any issues here. Overall a great experience.

text.text: Excellent doctor. I see many negative comments about the front office lady. I think she is overworked and not necessarily rude. Also in some cultures, women are a bit more reserved in a cultural sense.  Guess being patient with her will help and I didn't have any issues here. Overall a great experience.

originalText.text:
He is a fantastic doctor. Before going to him, I had seen two other allergists because I had been suffering from chronic hives for almost 8 months. He prescribed me the exact same medications as the previous doctors, but in a different amount and gave me clear instructions.

The very first night I took the medications after seeing him, I didn't have any hives at all. And it has stayed that way ever since. I really hope it stays the same. I just want to say, he has been an incredible blessing for me

text.text:

originalText.text: I love Dr. Brian Novick! He’s very knowledgeable and professional. And he’s just a super sweet man. He is efficient and really cares about his patients. I would give him 5 stars- but his receptionist is super abrasive and rude. My insurance doesn’t cover specialist 100% and because of what I’m going through I’ve been on disability- my job provides help when insurance doesn’t cover I have to submit a request to them fort. This receptionist was pressing me for a payment although I explained to her my situation. I haven’t seen one disability check yet either. Honestly just really put a bad taste in my mouth. Mind you- I’ve been in customer service management for over 10 years- so I know when to recognize an employee who does not care for her job. This really can bring down the doctors reputation and I’d highly suggest retraining or finding a replacement!

originalText.text: Dr. Novick is one of the best Allergist. Always see his patients on time, pleasant staff, never say no to walk-in patients, very knowledgeable, professional, sensitive and informative and Glad to meet him so I highly recommend Dr. Novick.  Also stack up on lots of  ice-cream for his staff:)
